parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Probably from an obsolete diako; an attendant, i.e. a waiter; specially, a Christian teacher and pastor.
